message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you an exclusive opportunity to purchase a unique and highly valuable product. I believe it has the potential to greatly benefit your business and personal life. I'm willing to sell it to you for $800000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $800000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $650000 for it. Can you meet me in the middle?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm afraid $650000 is still below my minimum threshold. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $750000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $750000. I'm willing to pay $675000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $725000. This is my final offer, and I'm confident it's a fair price considering the product's value. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $725000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $700000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and the market conditions.

I understand your concerns, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $725000. I'm willing to throw in some additional benefits, though. I can offer you a 1-year warranty and a dedicated support package, worth $20000, if you're willing to meet me at $720000. This is my final offer, and I'm confident it's a fair price considering the product's value and the additional benefits I'm offering.

I appreciate the additional benefits you're offering, but I'm still not convinced that the price is right. I'm willing to pay $705000 for the product, and I'll consider the warranty and support package you're offering as part of the deal. Can you meet me at this price?

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $715000, which is the lowest price I'm willing to accept. I'm not willing to go any lower, and I'm confident that this price still represents a fair value for the product. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
I've made a lot of concessions, and I'm willing to meet you at $710000. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to accept it, I'll have to look elsewhere for the product.
